Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. 表格中的列名依次为：所获奖项、作品名称、作品体裁、作者名称、发表年份、刊登期刊/出版社。不要问我任何问题，只需输出结果，输出格式为```markdown{数据内容}```?
